page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT
page.content: In Braunstone, there is a great variety of jobs for both men and women. The area is famous for hosiery and knitwear. Our survey found that many of our parents work in factories or had businesses. A lot of mothers work at Asda, the local supermarket, which is nearby. Some women are housewives. {Ford and Slater}is a firm in Braunstone which deals with heavy commercial vehicles. They sell, repair and hire them. They deal with different makes and employ about 200 people. {Jones and Shipman}are the biggest local employers with 844 workers in all their departments. They make machinery. Many of their workers are members of the AUEW union. The firm won a{Queens Award}for industry.
